meta.title: Behruz | Frontent Web Developer
meta.description: Portfolio of Behruz, a Senior Full-Stack Web Developer specializing in React, Node.js, and modern web experiences.

hero.description: I am a Frontend junior/middle developer creating modern, efficient, and user-friendly websites. I turn ideas into reality through code.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a passionate Full-Stack Developer based in Uzbekistan.
about.description_1: With a strong foundation in web development, I specialize in building scalable, responsive, and user-centric applications. My journey started with a curiosity for how the web works, which evolved into a career of solving complex problems through code.
about.description_2: I love working with the (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and modern tools like Tailwind CSS and Next.js. When I'm not coding, you can find me learning new technologies or exploring the tech community on Telegram.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies I work with to bring ideas to life.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work.
projects.project_1_desc: A comprehensive admin dashboard for e-commerce platforms with real-time analytics and inventory management.
projects.project_2_desc: A modern social media application featuring real-time messaging, post sharing, and user profiles.
projects.project_3_desc: An intuitive booking platform for flights and hotels with integrated map services and payment gateways.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's work together.
